alert.note: Alert for Carroll; Decatur; Henderson (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 04 at 4:24PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Henderson, southeastern Carroll and northwestern Decatur Counties through 500 PM CDT... At 424 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Wildersville, or near Natchez Trace State Park, moving southwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lexington, Natchez Trace State Park, Natchez Trace State Forest, Parsons, Reagan, Blue Goose, Parkers Crossroads, Darden, Bargerton, Wildersville, Scotts Hill, Clarksburg, Jeannette, Rock Hill, Union Cross, Juno, Timberlake, Hinson Springs, Cozette and Parker`s Cross Roads. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
